an3.40:1.5: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati:
an3.40:1.6: ‘na kho panaham civarahetu agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
an3.40:1.7: Na pindapatahetu, na senasanahetu, na itibhavabhavahetu agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
an3.40:1.8: Api ca khomhi otinno jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, dukkhotinno dukkhapareto.
an3.40:1.9: Appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayethati.
an3.40:1.10: Ahanceva kho pana yadisake kame ohaya agarasma anagariyam pabbajito tadisake va kame pariyeseyyam tato va papitthatare, na metam patirupan’ti.
an3.40:1.12: ‘araddham kho pana me viriyam bhavissati asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggan’ti.
an3.40:1.13: So attanamyeva adhipatim karitva akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti, savajjam pajahati, anavajjam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
an3.40:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati:
an3.40:2.3: ‘na kho panaham civarahetu agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
an3.40:2.4: Na pindapatahetu, na senasanahetu, na itibhavabhavahetu agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
an3.40:2.5: Api ca khomhi otinno jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, dukkhotinno dukkhapareto.
an3.40:2.6: Appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayetha’ti.
an3.40:2.7: Ahanceva kho pana evam pabbajito samano kamavitakkam va vitakkeyyam, byapadavitakkam va vitakkeyyam, vihimsavitakkam va vitakkeyyam, maha kho panayam lokasannivaso.
an3.40:2.8: Mahantasmim kho pana lokasannivase santi samanabrahmana iddhimanto dibbacakkhuka paracittaviduno.
an3.40:2.9: Te duratopi passanti, asannapi na dissanti, cetasapi cittam pajananti.
an3.40:2.11: ‘passatha, bho, imam kulaputtam saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito samano vokinno viharati papakehi akusalehi dhammehi’ti.
an3.40:2.12: devatapi kho santi iddhimantiniyo dibbacakkhuka paracittaviduniyo.
an3.40:2.13: Ta duratopi passanti, asannapi na dissanti, cetasapi cittam jananti.
an3.40:2.15: ‘passatha, bho, imam kulaputtam saddha agarasma anagariyam pabbajito samano vokinno viharati papakehi akusalehi dhammehi’ti.
an3.40:2.17: ‘araddham kho pana me viriyam bhavissati asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggan’ti.
an3.40:2.18: So lokamyeva adhipatim karitva akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti, savajjam pajahati, anavajjam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
an3.40:3.2: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arannagato va rukkhamulagato va sunnagaragato va iti patisancikkhati:
an3.40:3.3: ‘na kho panaham civarahetu agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
an3.40:3.4: Na pindapatahetu, na senasanahetu, na itibhavabhavahetu agarasma anagariyam pabbajito.
an3.40:3.5: Api ca khomhi otinno jatiya jaraya maranena sokehi paridevehi dukkhehi domanassehi upayasehi, dukkhotinno dukkhapareto.
an3.40:3.6: Appeva nama imassa kevalassa dukkhakkhandhassa antakiriya pannayethati.
an3.40:3.7: Svakkhato bhagavata dhammo sanditthiko akaliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattam veditabbo vinnuhiti.
an3.40:3.8: Santi kho pana me sabrahmacari janam passam viharanti.
an3.40:3.9: Ahanceva kho pana evam svakkhate dhammavinaye pabbajito samano kusito vihareyyam pamatto, na metam assa patirupan’ti.
an3.40:3.11: ‘araddham kho pana me viriyam bhavissati asallinam, upatthita sati asammuttha, passaddho kayo asaraddho, samahitam cittam ekaggan’ti.
an3.40:3.12: So dhammamyeva adhipatim karitva akusalam pajahati, kusalam bhaveti, savajjam pajahati, anavajjam bhaveti, suddham attanam pariharati.
